author:
John Wawrow                                                    
                            AP
title: Pietrangelo says Bouwmeester is in good health, taking outdoor walks
description: St. Louis Blues captain Alex Pietrangelo says Jay Bouwmeester is in good health after having a cardioverter defibrillator implanted in his chest.
content:
St. Louis Blues captain Alex Pietrangelo says teammate Jay Bouwmeester is in good health some seven weeks after having a cardioverter defibrillator implanted in his chest.
Pietrangelo said he and his teammates have occasionally stopped in to see Bouwmeester … [+1170 chars]
